hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:The family of Muhammad had not eaten wheat bread to their satisfaction for three consecutive days since his arrival at Medina till he died

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا كَانَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَأَصْحَابُهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
chapter.eng-name: What the Prophet (ﷺ) and his Companions used to eat.
